Body:
Emergency Management

Incident Tracking

Log Incident Reports, assign to open Incidents or create new Incidents

Command and Control

Deploy resources (people and equipment) & assign tasks. Can use Scenario templates to speed things up and improve consistency.

Situation Reporting

Expenses Tracking

Case Studies

  • SaFiRe: Sahana First Response. Seychelles Government Department of Risk and Disaster Management (DRDM)
  • SaFiRe: Sahana First Response. United Cajun Navy (USA)
